title: Mozilla Firefox not opening
content: Hai I'm using Mozilla Firefox (x64 en US) ver 113.0.2 in my desktop. When I open Firefox it shows a message that is Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may have the appropriate permissions to access the item. I'm facing this issue only in Mozilla Firefox. Kindly suggest a solution.
creator: sreedhardhanesh

title: Problem wiwth Bookmarks
content: I accidentally deleted all my bookmarks in my browser and my account synchronized them! Is there any way to restore bookmarks for July 17th or earlier?
creator: Sinteriya

title: secure.ssa.gov website
content: How do I tell Firefox that it's ok for me to go to the secure.ssa.gov website?
creator: lane11728

title: firefox browser will not open-message after clicking icon is** firefox.exe-bad image--
content:
Firefox has been installed and working on my pc computer for several years. Today the browser will not open. The only program file shown on install or uninstall is firefox.exe.

When I click on the start icon or try to open it from programs I get an error message. It says firefox.exe-bad image.

error status- 0xc000012f . Not designed to run on windows or it contains an error.

The Firefox Browser on my computer contains a lot of information. The user name is dltpm3@aol.com

How can I restore it? Maybe with MS Edge?

Thanks for suggestions.

Peter M.
creator: pmacqueen3

title: Malware threatens Firefox on my desktop
content: How do I erase the history on my desktop bc Firefox has been threatened by malware? I have Apple IOS desktop & I called Apple. They helped me close down Firefox on computer. MY FEAR IS that I cannot open Firefox again until I delete that history on my desktop. I am using my iPhone to continue. Please advise how to continue: qatarkat@yahoocom Wednesday night
creator: qatarkat
